thread.title: No-Bake Unicorn Cheesecake Is a Delicious Dream Come True
thread.title_full: No-Bake Unicorn Cheesecake Is a Delicious Dream Come True

author: Desiree O
title: No-Bake Unicorn Cheesecake Is a Delicious Dream Come True
text:
Desiree O Mon Jan 02 2017 
When we heard about unicorn chocolate and unicorn hot chocolate , we were pretty darn sure our delicious dreams had come true. But now, here comes unicorn cheesecake to whisk us away into a world of fantasy-based dessert delight. 
The obviously brilliant and whimsical AF peeps over at Delish recently shared a recipe for a simple, straight-forward (and seemingly easy to make) no-bake unicorn cheesecake which we’re pretty sure you’re going to have to try. 
A magical mixture of pastel-colored filling, even the pics are drool-worthy. Surely as delicious as it is gorgeous, it’s quickly become a fave of the Instagram crowd. 
Do you know anyone who would love a unicorn cheesecake? Tweet us @britandco !
